title: Lottery to Haven
description: JENNIFER MI feels contempt for the new world, and those choosing to abscond there.For the richest few, the new world offers refuge from a dying Earth; a place to start anew, free from past responsibilities to society. With each launch, a global lottery is convened to select one lucky winner to accompany every paying passenger.Cast in the lottery without her knowledge, Jen is drawn into a desperate snare that even her skills as a budding cyber security specialist are ill-equipped to untangle. Joined by four other winners, she must uncover New Worldsâ€™ shadowy motivations for THE LOTTERY.
author: William Gee
